name: CORNERSTONE FAMILY SERVICES, INC., Appellant v. BUREAU OF PROFESSIONAL AND OCCUPATIONAL AFFAIRS, Appellee, and Pennsylvania Funeral Directors Association, Intervenor
name_abbreviation: Cornerstone Family Services, Inc. v. Bureau of Professional & Occupational Affairs

parties: CORNERSTONE FAMILY SERVICES, INC., Appellant v. BUREAU OF PROFESSIONAL AND OCCUPATIONAL AFFAIRS, Appellee, and Pennsylvania Funeral Directors Association, Intervenor.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of January, 2004, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
842 A.2d 918
CORNERSTONE FAMILY SERVICES, INC., Appellant v. BUREAU OF PROFESSIONAL AND OCCUPATIONAL AFFAIRS, Appellee, and Pennsylvania Funeral Directors Association, Intervenor.
